definition[0]: temporary damage to the brain that makes you lose consciousness or feel sick for a short time, usually caused by something hitting your head
example[0]: He was taken into hospital with concussion.
definition[1]: an injury to the brain that makes you lose consciousness or feel sick for a short time, usually caused by something hitting your head
example[1]: I had a concussion, a broken leg and some minor injuries.
example[2]: He suffered a mild/serious concussion as a result of the accident.
definition[2]: a violent shaking movement, caused by the very loud sound of something such as an explosion
example[3]: The ground shuddered and heaved with the concussion of the blast.
